sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"朋友"之意。
means: friend ： 一般用词，指某人喜爱并乐意与之相交往的人。
mate ： 最普通用词，既可指好友、同事，又可指合伙人，还可指配偶的一方。
acquaintance ： 指彼此相识，但交往不甚密切，相互间没有深厚情感的人。
pal ： 口语用词，指十分要好的朋友。

sentence.Network_en: Hammer's business pedigree almost gua-ranteed him the acquaintance of U.S. presidents.
sentence.Network_cn: 哈默的商业背景几乎保证了他能够结识美国总统。

sentence.Network_en: I am so pleased to make your acquaintance, Mr Tweed.
sentence.Network_cn: 很高兴认识您，特威德先生。

sentence.Network_en: On first acquaintance she is cool and slightly distant.
sentence.Network_cn: 初次相见时她表现冷淡并有点爱搭不理。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英文字典_百度文库 ... acquaint 通知 acquaintance 熟知;相识 acquire 获得.
2012英语四级词汇复习资料_百度文库 ... acid n. 酸；酸的，酸性的 acquaintance n. 认识；了解；熟人 acquire vt. 取得；获得；学到.
免费-2013高考词汇表_百度文库 ... acknowledge v. 承认 acquaintance n. 熟人，（与某人）认识 acquire v. 获得，得到.
2013年英语四级词汇表(背诵)_百度文库 ... accuse vt. 指责；归咎于 acquaintance n. 认识；了解；熟人 acute a. 尖的，锐的；敏锐的.

list.abs: 不过这种点头之交（nodding acquaintance）十分重要，因为一旦需要深交，你知道该去哪里找它。很多深交都是这么从初交变成的。
九十 in English, translation,... ... 旧事 former matter;old affair 旧识 former acquaintance;old friend 救世 salvation.
华纳兄弟影片公司电影列表 - 豆丁网 ... 空军 Air Force 老相识 Old Acquaintance 永恒的少女 The Constant Nymph.
英语短语搭配 - 豆丁网 ... worried about （担心） 4 后接介词 acquainted with （对……熟悉） angrywith sb. （对某人生气）.

phrase.cizu_name: make the acquaintance of (或 make someone's acquain

jx.jx_en_mean: meet someone for the first time and come to know them slightly

means.word_mean: 社会关系,友情,亲密程度

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (in the sense 'mutual knowledge, being acquainted'): from Old French acointance, from acointier 'make known' (see acquaint)

entry.def: An acquaintance is someone who you have met and know slightly, but not well.

example.ex: The proprietor was an old acquaintance of his...
example.tran: 业主是他的一位旧相识。

example.ex: I have a large circle of friends and acquaintances engaged in photography.

entry.def: If you have an acquaintance with someone, you have met them and you know them.

example.ex: ...a writer who becomes involved in a real murder mystery through his acquaintance with a police officer...
example.tran: 因为认识一位警官而参与到一件真实谋杀悬案调查的作家

example.ex: On first acquaintance she is cool and slightly distant.
example.tran: 初次相见时她表现冷淡并有点爱搭不理。

entry.def: Your acquaintance with a subject is your knowledge or experience of it.

example.ex: They had little or no acquaintance with philosophy or history...
example.tran: 他们在哲学或是历史方面几乎一无所知。

entry.tran: 与（某人）初次相识;结识(某人)
entry.def: When you make someone's acquaintance, you meet them for the first time and get to know them a little.

example.ex: I first made his acquaintance in the early 1960s...
example.tran: 我与他初次相识是在20世纪60年代早期。

example.ex: I am so pleased to make your acquaintance, Mr Tweed.
example.tran: 很高兴认识您，特威德先生。

entry.def: A person of your acquaintance is someone who you have met and know.

example.ex: ...a highly cultivated woman of our acquaintance.
example.tran: 我们认识的一位很有修养的女性

means.word_mean: 1. personal knowledge or information about someone or something
2. a relationship less intimate than friendship
3. a person with whom you are acquainted;

sentences.sentence: "I have trouble remembering the names of all my acquaintances"

auth_sentence.content: Another extraordinary polymath of my acquaintance was Elkan R.
auth_sentence.res_content: Another extraordinary polymath of my acquaintance was Elkan R.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Another extraordinary polymath of my acquaintance was Elkan R.

auth_sentence.content: Remember Dr Johnson's old college acquaintance, Mr Edwards.
auth_sentence.res_content: Remember Dr Johnson's old college acquaintance, Mr Edwards.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Remember Dr Johnson's old college acquaintance, Mr Edwards.

auth_sentence.content: Through a mutual acquaintance, Tabibian sent him a message.
auth_sentence.res_content: Through a mutual acquaintance, Tabibian sent him a message.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Through a mutual acquaintance, Tabibian sent him a message.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 古雅的,古色古香的;古怪的
stems_affixes.word_buile: quaint知道→古怪的[想知道怎么回事]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 认识,相识,了解;相识的人,熟人
stems_affixes.word_buile: acquaint使认识,使了解,使熟悉+ance表名词→n.认识,相识,了解;相识的人,熟人
ac使+quaint知道→使[人们]知道→告知

Sentence.sentence: If you tell an acquaintance you are a grandfather who recently lost his wife and who does volunteer work on weekends, several elements of your self-image are bought to light — the roles of grandparent, widower and conscientious citizen.

means.word_mean: 相识的人, 熟人,泛泛之交
对…有了解, 熟知, 认识

sentences.en: I have no acquaintance with this book.

jushi.english: Claire has a wide circle of friends and acquaintances.
He is not a friend, only an acquaintance.
jushi.chinese: 他不是朋友,只是一位相识的人。
